# Spatial Data Science

[data science]{.fragment .fade-in} [that treats location]{.fragment .fade-in}[, distance]{.fragment .fade-in}[, and spatial interaction]{.fragment .fade-in} [as core aspects of the data]{.fragment .fade-in} [and employs specialised methods]{.fragment .fade-in} [and software]{.fragment .fade-in} [to store, retrieve, explore, analyse, visualise and learn from such data.]{.fragment .fade-in}

## Spatial Data Science vs GIS

#### advanced statistical and computational techniques to analyse and derive insights from spatial data {.fragment .fade-in}

#### deeper in computation {.fragment .fade-in}

#### complex data pipelines (unlimited power of coding) {.fragment .fade-in}

---

### Spatial data science often draws from GIS [but extends its capabilities by incorporating more extensive data analysis and modelling techniques]{.fragment .fade-in}

---

::: {.fragment .fade-in}
though some overlaps in the Esri world do exist
